staffMember.name: Dave Soler
staffMember.description: My name is Dave Soler and I've been creating software in the Philadelphia Area for over 6 years. I've created Android and iOS apps for teacher's and carpenter's unions, I've developed marketing websites for a local farm, I've even written software for the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia to help analyze patient data. Needless to say, I've seen it all and am confident I can help create software to solve your business needs.
